questions.quote: Oh, yeah. I mean, of all the men that I know, you're the only one who's held down a steady job for several years.
Coffee shop? I think we can do a little better than that. You look like you could use a solid meal at a real restaurant.
It's a movie stub from the 9:30 show. George, I think Willie the dry-cleaner has been wearing my clothes.
Yeah, I'll come by after work. Hey, I got a rubber pencil thing happenin' here..  Uh, I gotta go. I gotta go.  Sandra! Sandra? Hi, can you come here for a second?
Uh, well, uh, you know I can't right now, you know, uh, I got a very big meeting, I got these people interested in my movie treatment. So, uh, I guess we'll have to make it another time, alright?
"I want you to have this job, of course the Board of Directors is under indictment and will be serving time."
OK, now I projected some of those figures for you regarding the switch to Canola oil for the stadium popcorn and surprisingly it will only come to 1/2 a cent more per bag, so it is definitely doable.
It doesn't matter. You'll fix it later. Tell me about your girlfriend.
So, somehow the Bronzo  is reacting to the poison she's giving you.
Well I am. Couldn't you try to go through some of that stuff I put in your shoebox?
